summary: Where the Red Fern Grows is the heartwarming and adventurous tale for all ages about a young boy and his quest for his own red-bone hound hunting dogs.
cast: Joseph Ashton|Dave Matthews|Renee Faia|Mac Davis|Kris Kristofferson|Ned Beatty|Dabney Coleman|Gary Anson|Orvel Baldridge|Robert Bauman|Andrew Dickison|Stuart Dickison|Julia Downs|Tess Downs|Kevin Gourd|Zack Hamilton|Kyle Jeffrey|Lindsey Labadie|Dave Lowry|Erin O'Shaughnessy|Stan Randolph|Steve Sandalis|Charles Seat|Eric Starkey|Luke Strode|Robert S. Telford|Baron|Johnny Dowers|Rocky Frisco
keywords: raccoon|hound|hound dog|sister sister relationship|brother sister relationship
title: Where the Red Fern Grows
